mapper.sql: id, page_code, page_name, data_department, chart_name, data_type, data_synchronize, data_status, data_question, data_sort, data_judge, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into sunmnet_page_data_source
id,
page_code,
page_name,
data_department,
chart_name,
data_type,
data_synchronize,
data_status,
data_question,
data_sort,
data_judge,
create_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{pageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chartName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataSynchronize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataSort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dataJudge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update sunmnet_page_data_source
page_code = #{pageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
page_name = #{pageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_department = #{dataDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chart_name = #{chartName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_type = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_synchronize = #{dataSynchronize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_question = #{dataQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_sort = #{dataSort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
data_judge = #{dataJudge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sunmnet_page_data_source set page_code = #{pageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page_name = #{pageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_department = #{dataDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chart_name = #{chartName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_type = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_synchronize = #{dataSynchronize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_question = #{dataQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_sort = #{dataSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_judge = #{dataJudge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, -- 主键ID chart_name AS chartName, -- 统计图名称 d.data_type AS dataTypeCode, -- 数据类型编码 s.dict_name AS dataType, -- 数据类型 data_synchronize AS dataSynchronize, -- 数据同步时间 data_question AS dataQuestion -- 数据问题 FROM sunmnet_page_data_source d LEFT JOIN (SELECT dict_no,dict_name FROM sunmnet_select_dict_info WHERE dict_type='SYS_SJBG_DATA_TYPE') s ON d.data_type=s.dict_no WHERE page_code = #{pageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY data_sort ASC
